title: Order Confirmed
description: Fired when an order is confirmed.

total.description: The total monetary value of the order.

currency.description: ISO 4217 3-letter currency code (e.g. USD, EUR, GBP).

estimatedDelivery.description: ISO 8601 date or datetime for the estimated delivery.

quantity.description: The quantity of this product in the order.

price.description: The unit price of the product.

products.description: The list of products included in the order.

shippingMethod.description: The shipping method selected for the order.

city.description: The city of the shipping address.

region.description: The state, province, or region of the shipping address.

country.description: The country of the shipping address.

postalCode.description: The postal or ZIP code of the shipping address.

shippingAddress.description: The shipping address for the order (excludes street for privacy).
